languages.text: "Лагерь разгромлен. Это... ярость моих собратьев? Они боролись с монстрами в лице мон-кай и сами в итоге стали похожи на монстров".
"The camp was routed. Was it... the fury of my kin? They fought monsters from among the mon-keigh, only to become no different than monsters themselves."
languages.original_text: "Лагерь разгромлен. Это... ярость моих собратьев? Они боролись с монстрами в лице мон-кай и сами в итоге стали похожи на монстров".

traits.locale_text: "The camp was routed. Was it... the fury of my kinspeople? They fought monsters from among the mon-keigh, only to become no different from monsters themselves."
"The camp was routed. Was it... the fury of my kinspeople? They fought monsters from among the mon-keigh, only to become no different from monsters themselves."
"The camp was routed. Was it... the fury of my kinspeople? They fought monsters from among the mon-keigh, only to become no different from monsters themselves."
"The camp was routed. Was it... the fury of my kinspeople? They fought monsters from among the mon-keigh, only to become no different from monsters themselves."
"The camp was routed. Was it... the fury of my kin? They fought monsters from among the mon-keigh, only to become no different than monsters themselves."
"The camp was routed. Was it... the fury of my kin? They fought monsters from among the mon-keigh, only to become no different than monsters themselves."

languages.text: “这座营地被彻底破坏掉了。这是……我愤怒的族人们干的吗？他们与猴子之中的怪物战斗，结果他们自己也变成了怪物。”
languages.original_text: "The camp was routed. Was it... the fury of my kin? They fought monsters from among the mon-keigh, only to become no different than monsters themselves."

traits.locale_text: “这座营地被彻底破坏掉了。这是……我愤怒的族人们干的吗？他们与猴子之中的怪物战斗，结果他们自己也变成了怪物。”

languages.text: "Das Lager wurde überfallen. War das ... der Zorn meiner Verwandten? Sie haben gegen Monster aus den Reihen der Chem-Pan-Sey gekämpft und sind dann selbst zu Monstern geworden."
languages.original_text: "The camp was routed. Was it... the fury of my kin? They fought monsters from among the mon-keigh, only to become no different than monsters themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Das Lager wurde überfallen. War das ... der Zorn meiner Verwandten? Sie haben gegen Monster aus den Reihen der Chem-Pan-Sey gekämpft und sind dann selbst zu Monstern geworden."

languages.text: «El campamento ha sido arrasado. ¿Fue... la furia de mis congéneres? Lucharon contra mon-keigh monstruosos hasta que ellos mismos acabaron convertidos en monstruos».
languages.original_text: "The camp was routed. Was it... the fury of my kin? They fought monsters from among the mon-keigh, only to become no different than monsters themselves."

traits.locale_text: «El campamento ha sido arrasado. ¿Fue... la furia de mis congéneres? Lucharon contra mon-keigh monstruosos hasta que ellos mismos acabaron convertidos en monstruos».

languages.text: « Les occupants du camp ont dû prendre la fuite. Était-ce... à cause de la fureur de mes semblables ? En combattant les monstres dans les rangs des mon-keigh, ils ont fini par devenir aussi abominables qu'eux. »
languages.original_text: "The camp was routed. Was it... the fury of my kin? They fought monsters from among the mon-keigh, only to become no different than monsters themselves."

traits.locale_text: « Les occupants du camp ont dû prendre la fuite. Était-ce... à cause de la fureur de mes semblables ? En combattant les monstres dans les rangs des mon-keigh, ils ont fini par devenir aussi abominables qu'eux. »

languages.text: 「キャンプは壊滅した。それは…私の同胞の怒りだったのか？彼らはモン＝ケイの怪物と戦ったが、それで彼らも彼らと同じく怪物となってしまった」
languages.original_text: "The camp was routed. Was it... the fury of my kin? They fought monsters from among the mon-keigh, only to become no different than monsters themselves."

traits.locale_text: 「キャンプは壊滅した。それは…私の同胞の怒りだったのか？彼らはモン＝ケイの怪物と戦ったが、それで彼らも彼らと同じく怪物となってしまった」

languages.text: "Kampın altı üstüne gelmiş. Yoksa... Soydaşlarımın öfkesi miydi bu? Mon-keighler arasındaki canavarlarla savaşsalar da nihayetinde kendileri de canavardan farksız hâle geldiler."
languages.original_text: "The camp was routed. Was it... the fury of my kin? They fought monsters from among the mon-keigh, only to become no different than monsters themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Kampın altı üstüne gelmiş. Yoksa... Soydaşlarımın öfkesi miydi bu? Mon-keighler arasındaki canavarlarla savaşsalar da nihayetinde kendileri de canavardan farksız bir hâle geldiler."
